get_tr

bidsprep.utils.get_tr(nifti_file_or_img)[source]

Get the Repetition Time from the header of a NIfTI image.

Parameters:

nifti_file_or_img (str or Nifti1Image) – Path to the NIfTI file or a NIfTI image.

Returns:

float – The repetition time.
